column4: Hey Gang - I have edubuntu 8.04 installed and / is on raid1 /dev/md0. I marked a disk as failed and removed, and shutdown the system. Now on power back up, I get a message that /dev/md0 is missing
you guys are awesome! - I'm in BusyBox - can I do a recovery from here or do I need the live cd?
Sorry - I thought Flannel was responding to my question about a lost md0
You'll likely need a liveCD.  But I'm not extremely versed in RAID
